description.narrative: The aim of the project is to fund the Global Subsidies Initiaitive (GSI) which is part of the International Institute for Sustainable Development (IISD). IISD is an ODA-eligible International Non-governmental Organisation which Finland already funds. GSI p romotes fossil fuel subsidy reform. Such reform advances global climate goals the wiser use of public funds as well as social justice as fossil fuel subsidies tend to be regressive. Fossil fuel subsidy reform is integrated into the Finnish Action Plan for Taxation and Development as part of the wise use of public resources. The goal of the project is to sthrengthen the capacity of developing countries to implement fossil fuel subsidy reform through the creation of a new Network for Action on Fossil Fuel Su bsidy Reform as well as to promote the integration of fossil fuel subsidy reform into international processes (climate trade sustainable development)
